## Jack Jewson

Senior Lecturer at Monash EBS

. . . 

Did my PhD at the University of Warwick in the UK before an extended post-doc at Universitat Pompeu Fabra in Barcelona.

. . . 

Researching along two themes in Bayesian Statistics:

. . . 

::: {.incremental}

-   *Generalised Bayesian Updating* which replaces log-likelihoods by robust loss functions to improve estimation and decision making

-   *Variable Selection* seeking to estimate structure in data by investigating the presence or absence of certain aspects of the model i.e whether a parameter is non-zero or zero

:::
